mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B'

SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.PHONE, M.EMAIL, M.STATUS, (SELECT SUM(OIL) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) AS OIL FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN OIL_LIST O ON(M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_TYPE='B' ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B'
AND STATUS='Y' OR STATUS='N'
AND STATUS='Y'
AND STATUS='N'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND (TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') < TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.PHONE, M.EMAIL, M.STATUS, (SELECT SUM(OIL) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) AS OIL FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN OIL_LIST O ON(M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_TYPE='B'
AND M.STATUS='Y' OR M.STATUS='N'
AND M.STATUS='Y'
AND M.STATUS='N'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND (TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') < TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'))
ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO DESC
